reuseList.title: Are you sure?
reuseList.message: Do you want to reuse this list of products? You’ll be able to modify each product’s values in "New Register" by clicking the "Purchases" button

removeList.title: Are you sure?
removeList.message: Do you want to delete this product list? You will not be able to view or reuse it

indicators.noData: No data. Go to "New Register" and add some products :)
